DOC.brief_summary: To estimate pharmacokinetics relative bioavailability oxycodone administration 40 mg dos four PF-00345439 formulation oxycodone solution
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics And Relative Bioavailability Study Of Oxycodone
DOC.detailed_description: This study estimate PK relative bioavailability oxycodone follow single oral 40-mg dos 3 modify PF-00345439 Formulations B , C , D compare reference Formulation A fed condition .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 21 55 year , inclusive Evidence history clinically significant disease
